org.jpc.engine.embedded

Class JpcEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpc.engine.prolog.AbstractPrologEngine
      • org.jpc.engine.embedded.JpcEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PrologDatabase, PrologEngine

    public class JpcEngine
extends AbstractPrologEngine
    The embedded Jpc Prolog database. (Note: only a small subset of a Prolog engine has been currently implemented).
    Author:
    sergioc

      • isCloseable

        public boolean isCloseable()
        Returns:
        true if the Prolog engine can be closed (i.e., its resources can be freed). false otherwise.

      • threadModel

        public ThreadModel threadModel()
        Returns:
        the thread model of the Prolog engine. This specifies if the engine can manage or not concurrent requests.

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: PrologEngine
        Close the logic engine and free associated resources. Once the session is not required it can be closed. However, some drivers do not allow this and will throw an UnsupportedOperationException instead
        Specified by:
        close in interface PrologEngine
        Specified by:
        close in class AbstractPrologEngine
